## download the IMDB dataset  
```{r download IMDB dataset, cache=TRUE}
imdb <- dataset_imdb(num_words = 10000)

c(train_data, train_labels) %<-% imdb$train
c(test_data, test_labels) %<-% imdb$test 
```
